overview: Saraswati and Pandu get married. Sam, whose love was rejected by Saraswati, intrudes into their lives. Saraswatiâ€™s concern is proven when Pandu has an accident. He breaks his leg and his face is injured. With a help of a shaman, Sam manages to disfigure Pandu's face and seduce Saraswati. Sam's girlfriend Utari becomes irate over all of this and finds another shaman to harm Saraswati. Can Islamic religious leader Kyai sort all this out?
title: Seducing Witchcraft
